price: 3. Raaca (dadow) waxa (Qur’aanka) la idiinka soo dejiyey xagga (Alle) Rabbigiin, hana raacina sokadii awliyo (aad la barbar caabuddaan oo u yeedhataan, gargaarna weydiistaan ).Yaraa intaad waantowdaan.
arabic: ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَۗ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ittabiʿū mā unzila ilaykum min rabbikum walā tattabiʿū min dūnihi awliyāa qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
